ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 232
ygData.msgSnippet: I have to throw me two cents in here,   and say  Get used to it. people (not all but alot) are morons.... when it comes to enchanters espessialy at your
ygData.messageBody:
I have to throw me two cents in here, and say Get used to it. people (not
all but alot) are morons.... when it comes to enchanters espessialy at your
level.. when your in Cazic or Paw at mid twenties or even MM is when people
actually figure out "hey so that's what enchnaters are good for" i was at
cazic last night doiong Throne Room and we got spawned on three times while
doing pulls, total overall there were about 8-9mobs each time and with
finesse the group fell in love with me... we got exp out the waaazzuuu
because they woulda had to zone otherwise each time it happend, i cheat to i
get my CHA up high and use a level 16 spell mezmerization.
And i always have them go for whatever mob has a pet first just becuase i
can mem blur the pet afterwards to make it pop.
Later when you get higher up you'll endup being the one who calls the
shots when multi mobs arrive.
Sad thind is that you'll quit bitchin about why peeps don't know how to
use a chanter and start complainin about caster type groups only wanting you
for clarity (meaning that's all your good for) when it's just the oppisite.

As far as soloing my advise is pets are okay and all if your group needs
another tank type, but if i were you i'd get your charisma up as high as you
can.... because when it comes to solo the Charm line of spells is the way to
go. I can solo stuff easy with that and chase the moon heh, i can't wait
for level 35 cause i'm gonna play with specs :o). If you wanna solo use your
charm line of spells ie charm beguile... blah blah those wiil help you
alot. i solo when i can't find a group all the time useing this spell :o)
and later on in the game, ie. lvl 40+ enchanter can solo multi mobs with
only a few spells...... a 46lvl enchanter in my guild solos multi (up to 4
from what i've seen) useing Charm and Fear line of spells, charms one fears
the others cept one, lets it hit him then fears it while the other spec goes
to town....you can also mez the other two roamin specs...

all in all chanters are a pretty nice charater to play but i personnaly
chose this class because of the group emphasis...


Chantisis Tashania
Rodcet Nife
